# Read the Docs Documentation

> https://docs.readthedocs.com/platform/stable/

Read the Docs simplifies software documentation by automating building, versioning, and hosting of your docs for you.

## Documentation Structure

- Getting Started: /platform/stable/tutorial/
- Guides: /platform/stable/guides/
- Reference: /platform/stable/reference/
- API: /platform/stable/api/

## Key Features

- Automatic building and versioning
- Support for multiple documentation tools (Sphinx, MkDocs)
- Custom domains and branding
- Search functionality
- Traffic analytics
- Version control integration

## Metadata files

- robots.txt: /robots.txt
- sitemap.xml: /sitemap.xml
- llms.txt: /llms.txt

## This llms.txt File

This is an example llms.txt file for Read the Docs documentation. It demonstrates the llms.txt feature that allows projects to provide LLM-friendly content at the root of their documentation.

For more information about llms.txt support on Read the Docs, see: /platform/stable/reference/llms-txt/
